jump_scares.spoiler: A fast moving figure moves past in the foreground followed by another a few seconds later
Danny jumps out at Chloe (as a joke)
The figure of an old woman can be seen by the window
An eye suddenly appears at the peephole that Danny is looking through
Danny’s laptop starts to make a ringing noise
A scary face suddenly appears on Chloe’s laptop screen
During a tense scene, a door opens as Chloe approaches it
After waking from a dream, Jess looks across and sees Chloe watching her
Jess starts talking from behind Chloe
Chloe sees a mummified corpse in the mirror
The door starts to close on Jess
A shadowy figure moves past in the foreground
A woman suddenly appears in front of Chloe shouting “RUN!”
A bird flies out from underneath the red sheet which startles Jess
A hand suddenly touches Jess on the shoulder
A hand grabs the cage that Chloe is trapped in
Jess approaches the cage and is startled to see Chloe in it
Detective Boardman shines the torch on the old woman who reaches out for him
A loud bang on the door startles Jess and Chloe
